item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (656 points | 206 comments)
2. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant modal shift from road to rail (81 points | 25 comments)
3. The ACF plugin on the WordPress directory has been taken over by WordPress.org (105 points | 12 comments)
4. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (456 points | 59 comments)
5. Machine learning and information theory concepts towards an AI Mathematician (38 points | 7 comments)
6. DuckStation (74 points | 22 comments)
7. AMD's Turin: 5th Gen EPYC Launched (286 points | 132 comments)
8. Using drones to terrorize a city [video] (51 points | 23 comments)
9. Turkish language has a gossip tense (78 points | 53 comments)
10. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (309 points | 218 comments)
11. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (103 points | 21 comments)
12. IcePanel (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers in Vancouver ( | hide)
13. Ion and Molecular Sieving with Ultrathin Polydopamine Nanomembranes (7 points | discuss)
14. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What Have Researchers Learned? – Illinois Fishing Hub (41 points | 14 comments)
15. Researchers Find Cannibalized Victim of 19th-Century Arctic Voyage (35 points | 10 comments)
16. Starship Flight 5 license issued by FAA (160 points | 109 comments)
17. Started a guide to writing FUSE filesystems in Python (241 points | 61 comments)
18. Nvidia Stock Rises. AMD's New AI Chip Is Not Competitive (12 points | 7 comments)
19. Analyzing New Unique Identifier Formats (UUIDv6, UUIDv7, and UUIDv8) (4 points | 1 comment)
20. Tiny Drones Do Distributed Mapping (29 points | 1 comment)
21. Six transplant patients in Brazil contract HIV from infected organs (121 points | 49 comments)
22. Conway's Gradient of Life (372 points | 40 comments)
23. Free Starship Booster catching arcade game (32 points | 11 comments)
24. Swarm, a new agent framework by OpenAI (165 points | 62 comments)
25. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (330 points | 47 comments)
26. Lm.rs: Minimal CPU LLM inference in Rust with no dependency (299 points | 75 comments)
27. PostgreSQL Streaming Replication (WAL); What It Is and How to Configure One (143 points | 26 comments)
28. Show HN: Self-Hostable Algolia DocSearch Replacement (92 points | 36 comments)
29. The Society in Dedham for Apprehending Horse Thieves (59 points | 26 comments)
30. Python and SysV Shared Memory (50 points | 5 comments)
